name: PAX_JOURNEY_UNIT
description: Represents a single passenger journey, including its unique ID ('PaxJourneyID'), duration ('Duration'), and a reference to a segment ('PaxSegmentRefID').
prompt: Ensure that each <PaxJourney> node contains a unique <PaxJourneyID>, a valid <Duration> in ISO 8601 format, and a <PaxSegmentRefID> that references an existing segment.
